title:
Discover
Our Samyhart
description: Samyarth is a combination of Samyak (wholesome/right) + Arth (meaning/finance) and includes in its name Samarth (being able). The cooperative works with for-profits, governments and nonprofits across diverse offerings. While the current focus is on technology services (web development, app development, low-code/no-code, etc.), it is building capacity to deliver financial, educational services, etc.
subtitle: Passionately Creating Design Wonders: Unleashing Boundless Creativity
